name: Poached Skate With Pesto Sauce
keywords: dairy-free, nut-free, vegetarian, fresh herbs, skate wing, main course
recipeIngredient: 4 boneless, skinless skate wings, about 1 1/2 pounds
4 sprigs fresh thyme, or 1 teaspoon dried

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange the skate wings in a skillet large enough to hold all the fish in one layer. Cover with water and add the vinegar, thyme, bay leaf, parsley, salt and peppercorns. Bring to a gentle rolling boil and turn off the heat. Let sit for four to five minutes.
Drain the fish and transfer them to warm serving plates on top of the orzo. Drizzle some pesto sauce over all and serve immediately.
